pr_title: Fix the BMM event processing time metric to be in nanoseconds instead of milliseconds

timeline.message: Fix the BMM event processing time metric to be in microseconds instead of milliseconds
Change processing time metric to nanos and use System.nanoTime to calculate it

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick. Can't we just pass System.nanoTime() to processRecords directly here cause I dont see we logging this variable in any other way.
timeline.author: vishwajith-s
